text: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.
author: Christopher Morley

text: Am I a romantic? I've seen 'Wuthering Heights' ten times. I'm a romantic.
author: Johnny Depp

text: You know what your problem is, it's that you haven't seen enough movies - all of life's riddles are answered in the movies.
author: Steve Martin

text: This film cost $31 million. With that kind of money I could have invaded some country.
author: Clint Eastwood
